sentences.en: Arsenic was also widely available at the time, handed out in the form of Fowler's Solution as a treatment for everything from rheumatism – something Austen complained of in her letters – to syphilis.
sentences.cn: 砷在当时以福勒氏溶液（亚砷酸钾溶液）的形式被广泛使用：该溶液被作为一种医治百病的药剂——从风湿病到梅毒——奥斯汀在信中曾抱怨过此事。

sentences.en: Arthritis and rheumatism are prominent crippling diseases.
sentences.cn: 关节炎和风湿病是会严重损害身体健康的主要疾病。

sentences.en: Due to the harsh environment, at least one person in each household suffers from diseases like rheumatism, stomach complaint and gynecological disease.
sentences.cn: 恶劣的生活环境导致了每个家庭都有成员存在不同程度的疾病。 风湿病、胃病、妇科病常伴着他们。

sentences.en: He has an uphill battle against rheumatism.
sentences.cn: 他与风湿病作艰苦顽强的斗争。

sentences.en: I was laid up in bed with acute rheumatism.
sentences.cn: 我染上了急性风湿，卧病在床。

sentences.en: Our tincture of tiger bone is used in treating arthritis and rheumatism.
sentences.cn: 我们的虎骨酒是用于治疗关节炎和风湿病的.

sentences.en: Rheumatism affects people living in damp localities.
sentences.cn: 住在潮湿地区的人易患风湿病.

sentences.en: Rheumatism prevents him form bending his back.
Rheumatism tries me a great deal.
She had suffered from rheumatism all her life.
sentences.cn: 她一辈子受风湿病之苦.

sentences.en: She was somewhat crippled with rheumatism.
sentences.cn: 她由于得了关节炎,腿有点瘸.

sentences.en: The damp weather does not agree with my rheumatism.
sentences.cn: 这种潮湿的气候对我的风湿症不利.

sentences.en: The damp weather plays the very devil with my rheumatism.
sentences.cn: 潮湿的天气加重了我的风湿病.

sentences.en: The hot weather gave the old man a truce from rheumatism.
sentences.cn: 热天使这位老人暂时免受风湿病之苦.

sentences.en: The inhabitants are predisposed to rheumatism by the damp climate.
sentences.cn: 因气候潮湿,居民易患风湿症.

sentences.en: This wretched rheumatism has been playing me up again.
sentences.cn: 这讨厌的风湿病又在找我的麻烦了.

words.tran_cn: 风湿病的；风湿病引起的

trans.tran_en: a disease that makes your joints or muscles painful and stiff
